Package de.lases.persistence.repository

Class ScientificForumRepository

java.lang.Object
de.lases.persistence.repository.ScientificForumRepository
public class ScientificForumRepository extends Object
Offers get/add/change/remove operations on a scientific forum and the possibility to get lists of scientific forums.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScientificForumRepository

      public ScientificForumRepository()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static ScientificForum get​(ScientificForum scientificForum, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Takes a scientific forum dto that is filled with a valid id or a valid name and returns a fully filled scientific forum dto.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A ScientificForum dto that must be filled with a valid id or name.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A fully filled ScientificForum dto.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or name.
      InvalidFieldsException - If both name and id are provided, but they belong to two different scientific forums.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • add

      public static void add​(ScientificForum scientificForum, Transaction transaction) throws DataNotWrittenException, KeyExistsException
      Adds a scientific forum to the repository.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A fully filled scientific forum dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      KeyExistsException - If there is already a scientific forum with the same id.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the scientific forum is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • change

      public static void change​(ScientificForum scientificForum, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Changes the given scientific forum in the repository.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A fully filled scientificForum dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the scientific forum is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • remove

      public static void remove​(ScientificForum scientificForum, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Takes a scientific forum dto that is filled with a valid id and removes this scientific forum from the repository.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - The scientific forum to remove. Must be filled with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - The specified scientific forum was not found in the repository.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • getList

      public static List<ScientificForum> getList​(Transaction transaction, ResultListParameters resultListParameters) throws DataNotCompleteException
      Gets a list all scientific forums.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      resultListParameters - The ResultListParameters dto that results parameters from the pagination like filtering, sorting or number of elements.
      Returns:
      A list of fully filled scientific forum dtos.
      Throws:
      DataNotCompleteException - If the list is truncated.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
      InvalidQueryParamsException - If the resultListParameters contain an erroneous option.

    • addEditor

      public static void addEditor​(ScientificForum scientificForum, User editor, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Adds the specified editor to the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      editor - A user dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • addScienceField

      public static void addScienceField​(ScientificForum scientificForum, ScienceField scienceField, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Adds the specified science field to the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      scienceField - A science field dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no science field with the provided id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • removeEditor

      public static void removeEditor​(ScientificForum scientificForum, User editor, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Removes the specified editor from the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      editor - A user dto with a valid id, which is an editor in the aforementioned forum.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id or the provided user is not an editor for the provided forum.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • removeScienceField

      public static void removeScienceField​(ScientificForum scientificForum, ScienceField scienceField, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Removes the specified science field from the specified scientific forum.
      Parameters:
      scientificForum - A scientific forum dto with a valid id.
      scienceField - A science field dto with a valid id that belongs to the aforementioned forum.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no scientific forum with the provided id or there is no science field with the provided id or the provided science field is not part of the provided field.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • getScientificForumForSubmission

      public ScientificForum getScientificForumForSubmission​(Submission submission)
      Returns the scientific forum that belongs to a specific submission.
      Parameters:
      submission - The submission to which the forum should be returned.
      Returns:
      The scientific forum for the given submission.
